item.description:
Before the game, we'll be having a potluck tailgate party in the parking lot on the Elmgrove Avenue side of the "stadium." Bring your favorite items for the portable grill and BYOB! We'll migrate next door and get seats together in the stadium before the football games kicks off at 12:30 PM. For the Ivy League, Brown and Yale both have good teams and it should be a competitive matchup. The zany undergraduate bands and people-watching can be entertaining as well. Tickets to the football game are $15. Park on side streets as the lot costs $20 per car. Of course you don't have to come to the game to join the tailgate...
http://www.brownbears...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a green Yale Forestry baseball cap and limping around in an ankle boot. I have a black Subaru and my cell number is (401) 225-6135.
item.name: Ivy League Football: Yale @ Brown
